feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
